notes: Additional discount for students below 18 years
Meeting room available on prior booking
Includes: 300 Mbps Wi-Fi, charging points, AC, power backup and backup Wi-Fi
The borrowing limit is imposed on the number of books a member can borrow at a time. There is no limit on how many times a member can exchange the books.
There is a one time registration fee of Rs 200 that is common to all plans and a refundable security deposit which varies from plan to plan depending on the borrowing limit of the plan.
Contact the front desk of the library for higher plans
